column4: Hi. Is it possible to combine contacts in Empathy? (same person from two different IM services?)
I think so... but only the grouping thing.
om26er: What does that mean? Say I have a friend called Mike on MSN and ICQ, I create a group called "Mike"?
I don't exactly what you mean, but if you have several similar usernames from diff. services, they appear in pidgin as several users.
